snippet: Kurt Sonnenfeld claims that he is being framed for his wife’s death to discredit his theories about government foreknowledge of the Sept. 11 attacks.
abstract: Argentina's Supreme Court rules that American Kurt Sonnenfeld, who sought refuge there after being charged with killing his wife in 2002, will be extradited to United States and tried in Denver; Sonnenfeld claims he is being framed for his wife’s death to discredit his theories about Sept 11 attacks.
lead_paragraph: Kurt Sonnenfeld claims that he is being framed for his wife’s death to discredit his theories about government foreknowledge of the Sept. 11 attacks.

headline.main: Argentina Agrees to Extradite American Who Sought Asylum
headline.print_headline: Argentina Agrees to Extradite American Who Sought Asylum
